hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Deku Tree#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Epona's Song#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Game Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #a Piece of the Triforce# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #0# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #4# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Boss Key#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Giant's Knife#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Song of Time# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Epona's Song#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Piece of the Triforce#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: It's time for you to look inward and begin asking yourself the big questions:^How did Medigoron get inside that hole, and how does he get out for the credits?

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of #gold#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path of #gold#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Giant's Knife#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Bottom of the Well#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Wallet#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that invisible ghosts can be exposed with Deku Nuts.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #0# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Spirit Temple#.
